Chapters

Check classes

Contains the base class to derive Validation checks from.  Also contains a few checks that are used internally and not available in form creations, and the factory class to register checks with.

Summary
Check classes
Contains the base class to derive Validation checks from.
Check
Base class for validation checks.
Properties
$validOptions
An array of valid option names for this check type.
Functions
addOption
Sets an option for a check.
getExpr
Returns an Expression representing this check.
getErrorMsg
Returns a string with a default error message when this check fails.
RequiredCheck
A check that ensures a value is given for a form input.
InEnumCheck
A check that ensures a value is within a limited set of valid values.
CheckFactory
The factory to generate validation checks.
Properties
$classes
A list of registered checks.
Functions
register
Registers a new check type.
create
Creates a new check.

Check

Base class for validation checks.

Due to the way checks are created, all Check constructors must not take any parameters.

Summary
Properties
$validOptions
An array of valid option names for this check type.
Functions
addOption
Sets an option for a check.
getExpr
Returns an Expression representing this check.
getErrorMsg
Returns a string with a default error message when this check fails.

Properties

$validOptions

An array of valid option names for this check type.  If a key is defined in this array, addOption will set a property with that name to the given values.  This is convenient since most options will be simple name/value settings.

Functions

addOption

public function addOption($name,
$value)

Sets an option for a check.  For each option tag this function is called.

Parameters

$nameThe name of the option.
$valueThe value given for the option.

getExpr

abstract public function getExpr(Expression $formEl)

Returns an Expression representing this check.

Parameters

$formElThe form element this check relates to.

getErrorMsg

abstract public function getErrorMsg()

Returns a string with a default error message when this check fails.

RequiredCheck

A check that ensures a value is given for a form input.  Only used internally.

InEnumCheck

A check that ensures a value is within a limited set of valid values.  Only used internally.

Options

valuesAn array of valid values.

CheckFactory

The factory to generate validation checks.

Summary
Properties
$classes
A list of registered checks.
Functions
register
Registers a new check type.
create
Creates a new check.

Properties

$classes

A list of registered checks.  The keys of this array are the names of the checks as used in the form, the values are the associated class names.

Functions

register

public static function register($id,
$className)

Registers a new check type.

Parameters

$idThe name of the check as used in the form.
$classNameThe name of the class that handles this check.

create

public static function create($id)

Creates a new check.

Parameters

$idThe name of the check to create.
